"""set up the needed path for load functions."""
self.parameters_used = 'bcipy/parameters/parameters.json'
self.parameters = load_json_parameters(self.parameters_used, value_cast=True)
self.data_save_path = 'data/'
self.user_information = 'test_user_001'
self.save = init_save_data_structure(self.data_save_path, self.
    user_information, self.parameters_used)
classmethod
